sources.name: STGACCT2
sources.script:
source(output(
		ACCT_ID as string,
		{ ACCT_TYP} as string,
		ACCT_DESC as string,
		CASH as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> STGACCT2

sinks.name: CUSTDTLSUMRY1
sinks.script:
EXPTRANS sink(input(
		Prop_0 as string,
		Prop_1 as string,
		Prop_2 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> CUSTDTLSUMRY1

transformations.name: EXPTRANS
transformations.script:
STGACCT2 derive(CASH = CASH,
		ACCT_ID = ACCT_ID,
		ACCT_DESC = ACCT_DESC,
		{ ACCT_TYP} = { ACCT_TYP}) ~> EXPTRANS
